meanings.definition: To erupt violently and forcefully, like a geyser.
meanings.sent1: The water geysered high into the sky.
meanings.sent2: The hot spring geysered with incredible power.
meanings.sent3: The soda can geysered when shaken too vigorously.
meanings.sent4: Emotions geysered out of her during the argument.
meanings.sent5: The volcano geysered molten lava, creating a spectacular display.

meanings.definition: To spout or shoot out in a sudden and rapid manner.
meanings.sent1: The oil geysered from the broken pipe.
meanings.sent2: The champagne geysered when the cork popped.
meanings.sent3: The popcorn geysered out of the machine, causing a mess.
meanings.sent4: Ideas geysered from his mind during the brainstorming session.
meanings.sent5: The burst pipe geysered water all over the basement floor.
